item.title: 10th Anniversary Edition of Tearstone
item.description: I wrote a book many, many years ago. This book served as my thesis novel for my MA degree from Seton Hill. I graduated in 2011. The book was first published in 2013. Since then, I’ve been through plenty of changes. My boys have grown quite a bit, my day job has changed several times, and I’ve spent a lot of time in therapy. Why is that last one important?
